			ERROR
			 =  "!!"
			(line 29)
		
	


	

An error type entry

	
	






	

		
		
			LOG_ERRORS
			 =  1
			(line 41)
		
	


	

Only errors are logged.

	
	






	

		
		
			LOG_EVERYTHING
			 =  4
			(line 53)
		
	


	

Runtime info + SMTP instructions + failures + errors.

	
	






	

		
		
			LOG_FAILURES
			 =  2
			(line 45)
		
	


	

Errors + sending failures.

	
	






	

		
		
			LOG_NETWORK
			 =  3
			(line 49)
		
	


	

All SMTP instructions + failures + errors.

	
	






	

		
		
			LOG_NOTHING
			 =  0
			(line 37)
		
	


	

Logging is off.

	
	






	

		
		
			NORMAL
			 =  "++"
			(line 33)
		
	


	

A standard entry

			 =  "<<"
			(line 25)
